thread.title: Glencore CEO says Zambia, DRC "accommodative" to copper cuts
thread.title_full: Glencore CEO says Zambia, DRC "accommodative" to copper cuts

title: Glencore CEO says Zambia, DRC "accommodative" to copper cuts
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Oct 5, 2015, 10:57 BST - UK Markets close in 5 hrs 33 mins Glencore CEO says Zambia, DRC "accommodative" to copper cuts Reuters - UK Focus – 2 minutes 15 seconds ago 1.371 +0.099 
LONDON, Oct (HKSE: 3366-OL.HK - news ) 5 (Reuters) - Glencore (Xetra: A1JAGV - news ) 's CEO Ivan Glasenberg said on Monday that Zambia and the Democratic Republic of Congo were "very accommodative" to copper production cuts proposed by the commodities giant. 
"We are not stopping the projects. We stop producing but we are finishing the construction," he told the FT Africa Summit in London. (Reporting by Dmitry Zhdannikov, editing by Louise Heavens) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
